ComicInfo.Title: Time to Die #2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Journey back to the days of the 1990s, when two characters debuted who would change the face of comics…Cable & Deadpool!
In this all-new tale, we learn of the pair's first meeting, well before New Mutants #98, as Cable and his soon-to-be X-Force race through the timestream to stop the reckless mercenary Deadpool before he destroys American history for good!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:00:30. [CVDB460313]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Michelle Delecki, Morry Hollowell, Shane Davis
ComicInfo.Editor: Frankie Johnson, Jordan D. White, Mike Marts
ComicInfo.Characters: Boom-Boom, Cable, Cannonball, Deadpool, Domino, Warpath
ComicInfo.Teams: British Army, Confederate Army, Union Army, United States Army, X-Force
ComicInfo.Locations: China, Germantown, Gettysburg, Hebei Province, Pennsylvania
